channel.title: Neighborhood Hood Equity Measures on BCHC COVID-19
channel.description: Recent content in Neighborhood Hood Equity Measures on BCHC COVID-19

item.title: Neighborhood Level Equity Measures
item.description: Equity Measure Summary % Poverty % of population whose income has dropped below the poverty level in the past 12 months. ICE - Income Index of Concentration (ICE) compares ACS HH income categories that appriximated cutpoints for the US 20th and 80th household income percentiles. Disadvantaged group includes those whose HH income were less than $25,000; advantaged group were those who were greater than or equal to $100,000.
